name: PACT OF 9
description:
ENTER AND SURVIVE. YOU'RE ALONE

Pact of 9 is an exploration and action 2d shooter inspired  by games like Castlevania SOTM and Super Metroid.

STORY

You are part of a secret order of generations of wizards known as as the Hellhunters  who protect the world from demons and evil spirits, you and your team were sent to investigate the great prison of demons , where the 9 Demon lords lie imprison.  

Your objective is to defeat the demons that escaped and stop the 9  Demon Lords from being released, Before they destroy the World.

Features
  •  Power ups with Progression.
  • Unique enemies and Bosses that give the player a challange
  •  Casual game  sessions
